All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimatedGameobject
    Convenience Class subclassing GameObject, pre-creationg a subclass of Artist that draws a bitmap animation described by the Animation class.
    Animation  
    AnimationArtist
    Rendering an object by displaying a predefined Animation, i.e., a sequence of bitmaps.
    Artist
    Base class for all Artists that draw GameObject instances.
    BossLevel
    Class that realizes all the game logic of a very simple game level.
    CircleArtist
    Rendering an object as a filled circle of a specified color and size.
    CircleCollider
    Collider for a circular object.
    Collider
    Abstract base class for all collider types.
    CollisionAwareEgoController  
    EgoController  
    EgoObject
    Convenience Class subclassing GameObject, pre-creationg a subclass of Artist that draws a circular white object.
    EnemyController
    This class controls the space invaders.
    ExperimentierLevel6  
    FallingStar
    Convenience Class subclassing GameObject, pre-creationg a subclass of Artist that draws a circular white point.
    FallingStarController
    Controls background stars.
    GameLoop
    Main class starting any game, contains main().
    GameObject
    The class GameObject represents an object appearing in a level of the game described by an instance of the class Playground.
    GameUI
    The main window of the game.
    HighscoreManager  
    HitTwiceLevel
    You have to hit aliens 3 times to destroy them.
    Level1
    Dummy Level.
    Level2
    Another almost-dummy level.
    Level3
    Aliens move in zigzag!
    Level4
    Simple spaceinvaders derivative.
    LimitedTimeController
    Controls and abject that is deleted after a lifetime specified in the constructor, and when it leaves the display.
    Menu  
    MineController  
    Music  
    ObjectController
    Class that controls the LOGICAL behavior of an object independently of how it is displayed or drawn.
    Playground
    Playground represents a level of the game, focussing on the game LOGIC and the graphical representation of the level itself (not its GameObject instances).
    Prog2Game  
    ReboundController  
    RectArtist
    Rendering an object as a filled rectangle of a specified color and size.
    RectCollider
    Collider for a rectangular object.
    RectObject
    Convenience Class subclassing GameObject, pre-creationg a subclass of Artist that draws a rectangular object.
    SaveGame  
    SimpleShotController  
    SpaceInvadersLevel
    Class that realizes all the game logic of a SpaceInvaders-type level.
    TextArtist
    Rendering an object as a text of a specified color, size and font.
    TextObject
    Convenience Class subclassing GameObject, pre-creationg a subclass of Artist that draws a text.
    ZickZackController
